title: Satellites capture dozens of explosive eruptions from La Soufrière volcano on St. Vincent island
content:
1. Satellites capture dozens of explosive eruptions from La Soufrière volcano on St. Vincent island  The Washington Post
  2. 'Huge' explosion rocks St. Vincent as volcano keeps erupting  The Associated Press
  3. 'Huge' explosion rocks St. Vincent as volcano keeps erupting  Fox News
  4. La Soufriere Erupts After Being Dormant More Than 40 Years  Inside Edition
  5. Ash Covers St. Vincent and Nearby Barbados Town After a Weekend of Eruptions (PHOTOS) | The Weather Channel - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com  The Weather Channel
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 人工衛星がセントビンセント島のラ・スフリエール火山からの数十回にわたる爆発的噴火を捉える
卫星拍摄到圣文森特岛La Soufrière火山的数十次爆炸性喷发。
衛星拍攝到聖文森特島La Soufrière火山的數十次爆炸性噴發。
